notification.title: System Notification
notification.subtitle: Official DAVE Announcement
notification.official:
'Invitation to the Automated Income Ecosystem with AI'

1. Launch of the Quant Algorithm Center
Dave has established an optimized asset management system based on an advanced AI-powered quant engine, which analyzes individual income opportunities and automatically executes them. Based on real-time market data, the risk-return balance is adjusted to achieve sustainable and stable returns.

2. Participatory Algorithm Strategy Program
This program is designed so that anyone can participate. A strategy-matching algorithm automatically provides optimized trading plans tailored to your investment style, risk preference, and asset size. From beginners to experts, everyone can utilize professional quant strategies to build a diversified income model in the global market.

3. Automated Trading Beyond Passive Investment
Dave's goal is to lower the entry barriers to data-driven automated trading—not just simple profits. By integrating and analyzing on-chain and off-chain data, optimal buy/sell timings are determined, and features such as arbitrage based on price differences and early risk avoidance before entering risk zones are provided to minimize user decision-making and control risk.

4. The Core of the Dave Quant Ecosystem – The DVC Token
DVC is the central currency of the Dave Quant Ecosystem and is used for strategy execution, profit distribution, access to premium features, and DAO governance on the platform. The DVC-based token economy creates trust and motivation among members through reward distribution based on contributions to paid algorithm strategies and a token-based ranking system.

5. Shape the Future of Quant Finance with Dave
Dave aims to go beyond simple profits by enabling fair competition in the market for everyone through the democratization of financial data and automation of strategies. Algorithm-based strategy automation, transparent profit distribution via smart contracts, real-time backtesting and strategy check tools, and a community-based strategy ranking system—experience a new paradigm of quantitative financial gains with Dave.

Join the Dave ecosystem now and become part of the blockchain-based automated income system.

problem1.question: What is Funding Product and how do I earn?
problem1.answer:
The financial management products are tools and solutions developed by the company to help users receive rewards quickly.
By staking digital assets on a blockchain network, users can earn rewards based on the POS (Proof of Stake) mechanism.
In this mechanism, users delegate their digital assets to a node, which then gains the right to perform actions like block creation and transaction packaging on the blockchain and receives rewards.
Users share the rewards obtained by the node in proportion to the number of staked positions.

problem2.question: How is expected yield calculated?
problem2.answer: Expected income is a projected daily estimate based on your subscription quantity and the product's annualized reference calculation, provided for informational purposes only.

problem3.question: When does interest start accruing?
problem3.answer: Interest accrual begins at 00:00 on T+1.

problem4.question: When are payouts made?
problem4.answer: Interest begins to accrue from T+1, and the earnings are distributed together with the principal after maturity.

problem5.question: What happens after the product matures?
problem5.answer: Fixed-term products are automatically redeemed upon maturity.

info.title: Dave Financial Product Overview
info.definition:
1. Definition and Function

Dave's **Financial Product** is an AI-based yield optimization tool designed to help users manage digital assets more systematically and efficiently. This product operates through Dave's verified financial partner network and an automated system based on smart contracts. Users can expect to earn interest or point rewards by depositing their assets.
info.settlement:
2. Transparency-Oriented Design

Blockchain Wallet-Based Operation: All deposit and yield activities are recorded on a public blockchain, allowing users to check the flow of funds in real time at any time. Automatic Reward Distribution: Once predefined conditions are met, the smart contract immediately distributes yields and principal.
info.trade1:
Based on the **subscription success date (T-Day)**:
From T+1, 00:00, yields are generated and daily cumulative yields are automatically calculated and displayed at 00:00 each day.
info.trade2:
📌 Participation
Users can invest in this financial product using assets held in their Dave wallet or funding wallet. The investment is processed via inter-wallet linked withdrawal, with no additional withdrawal fees.

📌 Yield Structure
Variable APY: The interest rate is adjusted regularly according to market conditions. Yield Start Date: Interest payments begin one business day after the subscription date.
info.trade3:
📌 Principal Recovery and Retention
Automatic settlement at maturity: At the end of the contract, principal and yield are deposited into the account in a lump sum. Early termination restriction: Early withdrawal or termination is not possible during the contract period.
info.trade4:
Transparency Guarantee: Asset flows are fully open and verifiable through blockchain-based tracking.

Enhanced Security: The integrity of principal and yield distribution is ensured through smart contracts and partner bank infrastructure.

User-Centered Design: Even expert-level financial products can be easily used thanks to automation optimized for UI/UX.

Yield Optimization Strategy: Internal quant algorithms and market data are used for dynamic adjustment to maximize returns.

vip.vip4: VIP4: At least 5000 USDT of assets + invite and activate 15 A-level, 15 B-level, and 15 C-level members.

vip.vip6: VIP6: At least 50000 USDT of assets + invite and activate 60 A-level, 60 B-level, and 60 C-level members.

overview.description: Upstart quantitative trading collects and analyzes major data from crypto exchanges, executing high-probability trades via algorithms.
overview.advantages: Provides more precise and efficient profitability compared to manual trading.
overview.assets: Targets various cryptocurrencies such as BTC, ETH, and USDT.
overview.automation: Supports automatic entry, exit, profit-taking, and loss reduction.
overview.no_manual: No need for manual trading decisions. Earn efficiently and stably.

method.example: Example: Buy BTC worth 1000 USDT on CoinEase, sell for 1050 USDT on OKX. 25 USDT goes to the platform, 25 USDT returns to the user.

vip_daily.vip4: VIP4: Up to 8 trades per day, daily profit rate between 5.9%-6.4%.

agencyCooperation.title: Agent Partner
agencyCooperation.subTitle: Overview
lines: Dave is a US-based fintech platform leading user-centric financial innovation, offering the Agent Partner Program to expand its partner ecosystem.

This is a professional partnership that goes beyond simple referrals, featuring a sustainable revenue structure and a transparent contribution settlement system. Dave's partners are considered strategic collaborators who receive real rewards for contributing to platform credibility and liquidity, not just intermediaries.
3-Tier Commission Reward Structure
Dave offers a 3-level commission settlement system based on quantifiable contributions.
Level 1 (Directly invited members): Receive 18% commission on the daily earnings of these members.
Level 2 (Members invited by your Level 1): Receive 7% commission on the earnings of these members.
Level 3 (Members invited by your Level 2): Receive 3% commission on the earnings of these members.
※ Earnings are automatically calculated in real time and settled daily or weekly.
※ Fake sign-ups, automated traffic, and users who violate the rules are excluded from commission eligibility.
※ Accounts may be suspended and earnings frozen if AML or KYC standards are violated.
Settlement Simulation
If A, B, and C are Level 1, 2, and 3 partners respectively, and each earns $100 per day:
- A's earnings: $100 × 18% = $18
- B's earnings: $100 × 7% = $7
- C's earnings: $100 × 3% = $3
⇒ Your total daily commission: $28
Expanded Structure Example
If all sub-accounts earn $100 per day and the number of valid members is as follows:
⇒ Total expected daily commission: $3,880
Value of Dave Partnership
Dave offers more than just commission value to its partners.
✔️ Sustainable Revenue Structure
Commission settlement based on users' actual earnings
No exaggerated profit models
Contribution measured by real numbers
✔️ Transparent Partnership System
System-based automated settlement
Real-time commission history inquiry
API-based earnings forecast provided before contract
✔️ Market Expansion Strategy
Expandable from the US to global markets
Agent network based on local communities
Dave's brand trust and technology infrastructure provided

quantitative.title: Quantitative Trading
quantitative.description:
Dave generates stable profits by precisely detecting market inefficiencies through CashAI™-based automated analysis models and algorithmic trading systems, executing high-frequency trading (HFT) and medium-short-term strategies.
**CashAI™** analyzes over 180 data points including users' cash flow, spending patterns, job level and income, and predicts lending and liquidity supply opportunities in real-time Granite Firmdave.com+1Nasdaq+1.
features: AI analysis based on global trading data
Automated execution of arbitrage between exchanges and markets
Risk control based on strategic portfolio → diversified asset management
quantitative.conclusion: Utilizing global ATM and real estate market data along with in-app user consumption patterns, the algorithm automates the flow of automatic decision-making → order execution → profit realization within seconds.

funding.title: Smart Investment Programs
funding.description: Dave provides various time-based investment products designed based on financial technology and user trust.
features: Daily yield sharing structure - Automatically distributes daily generated profits to investors, with options to withdraw profits or extend reinvestment.
Lock-up based management - Funds are locked for fixed periods per product, with principal + profit automatically settled at contract expiration.
USDT-based stable yield provision - Focus on predictable profit models rather than volatility
Escrow structure support - Safely stores asset flows and provides distribution systems based on platform profit flows
funding.conclusion: ** For VIP or institutional investors, customized profit products and preferential yield rates are provided.

blockchain.title: Blockchain Foundation
blockchain.description: Dave designs the entire platform based on blockchain and smart contracts.
features: All investment records, dividend processes, and asset flows are recorded on-chain and publicly verifiable
Automated profit distribution, contract execution, and condition compliance are all executed through smart contracts
Aims to build a decentralized trust ecosystem by eliminating the opacity of centralized finance
blockchain.conclusion: We provide a future-oriented platform by perfectly integrating blockchain's core values of transparency, security, and efficiency into financial services.

security.title: Robust Security Framework
security.description: Dave prioritizes the protection of user assets and data above all else.
features: Multi-layered security system applied across all features including CashAI™, ExtraCash™, and Checking/Goals accounts
Two-factor authentication (2FA), biometric authentication, and wallet address change restriction features provided
DDoS protection and real-time monitoring of abnormal transactions
User assets are distributed and stored in Multi-signature cold wallets
Deposit account protection through US Evolve Bank & Trust based on FDIC insurance
security.conclusion: By prioritizing security, we provide an environment where users can use the service with peace of mind.

quantTutorial.title: DAVE Arbitrage System
quantTutorial.description:
1. System Overview

DAVE utilizes a real-time AI analysis engine and strategy-based automated trading algorithms to capitalize on price imbalances (spreads) in the cryptocurrency market. It quantitatively analyzes and detects price differences between global exchanges for major assets (USDT, BTC, ETH, etc.), and automatically determines buy and sell timings to generate stable and efficient profits.

2. VIP Tier Structure

DAVE's precise arbitrage is divided into VIP tiers according to investment size and network contribution, with each tier supporting a set number of allowed automated trades.

sections.suitability: Who is this system suitable for?

method.title: Operation and Risk Cautions
method.description:
- DAVE uses only official APIs and verified algorithms.
- Fake/duplicate accounts and abnormal transactions are immediately blocked by the system and profits are forfeited.
- There are certain technical and market risks, so a careful understanding of automated trading is required in advance.
method.description2:
- Smart investors aiming for short-term quant-based arbitrage profits
- Beginners in digital assets with limited market experience
- Users seeking to implement automated management strategies for large assets
- Beginners with insufficient market response ability
- High-value investors wishing to utilize automated profit models

quantTutorial.overview:
1) Market Monitoring: The system collects real-time prices from global exchanges, continuously monitored by AI
2) Arbitrage Detection: If the price gap between certain assets exceeds a threshold, an automatic buy/sell signal is triggered
3) Automatic Execution: Buy and sell orders are executed simultaneously to secure spread profits
4) Profit Distribution: 50% of the generated profit is taken as a platform fee, and the remaining 50% is automatically distributed to investors

Guide: Profit Realization Procedure

1) Click the 'Execute Strategy' button → Automated trading is activated
2) The predefined quant algorithm is executed within about 1–3 minutes
3) Automatic selling is completed and profit is secured
4) The operational status can be transparently checked via real-time reports
vipUpgradeCriteria: VIP1: At least 35 USDT in assets required.
VIP2: At least 250 USDT + invitation of 2 users each from Grade A, B, and C.
VIP3: At least 800 USDT + invitation of 4 users each from Grade A, B, and C.
VIP4: At least 2,500 USDT + invitation of 17 users each from Grade A, B, and C.
VIP5: At least 4,000 USDT + invitation of 28 users each from Grade A, B, and C.
VIP6: At least 45,000 USDT + invitation of 50 users each from Grade A, B, and C.
※ All tier requirements are based on active users with real trading volume; abnormal registrations are excluded.
vipDaily: VIP1: Up to 6 trades per day, return rate 1.6% ~ 2.0%, based on 500 USDT → 8 ~ 10 USDT/day
VIP2: Up to 7 trades per day, return rate 2.1% ~ 2.4%, based on 2,000 USDT → 42 ~ 48 USDT/day
VIP3: Up to 8 trades per day, return rate 2.5% ~ 2.8%, based on 5,000 USDT → 125 ~ 140 USDT/day
VIP4: Up to 9 trades per day, return rate 3.1% ~ 3.5%, based on 20,000 USDT → 620 ~ 700 USDT/day
VIP5: Up to 10 trades per day, return rate 3.8% ~ 4.2%, based on 100,000 USDT → 3,800 ~ 4,200 USDT/day
VIP6: Up to 11 trades per day, return rate 4.3% ~ 5.3%, based on 200,000 USDT → 8,600 ~ 10,600 USDT/day

commonProblems.title: Common Issues
lines: Here are some common issues to be aware of when participating in the Upstart program.
1. New users must deposit at least 35 USDT to begin trading.
2. To withdraw funds, you must complete quantitative trades totaling at least 20 USDT.
3. The minimum withdrawal amount is 50 USDT.
4. Withdrawal processing can take 9–16 hours; please be patient.
5. When depositing, the rate corresponding to your VIP level will automatically increase.
6. Exchange rates are based on current market prices.
7. All criteria may vary according to market analysis.
8. You must follow approved deposit methods and market regulations.
9. Please check your transaction logs regularly.
10. You can contact customer support at any time.
fees: Upstart's quantitative system and automated guarantee process may incur additional withdrawal fees (0%–12%).
Fee rates are subject to change without notice.
Standard processing time is about 5 minutes; with guarantee processing, it may take up to 30 minutes.
Exchange rates are automatically updated based on market conditions.

general.title: 1. General Principles
general.1_1:
1.1 Structure of the Agreement

These Terms of Service (hereinafter referred to as the 'Agreement') set forth the basic rules and policies for users of the digital financial platform provided by **Dave Inc.** (hereinafter referred to as the 'Platform'). This Agreement includes the Privacy Policy, Know Your Customer (KYC) policy, Anti-Money Laundering (AML) policy, technical usage guidelines, security instructions, and service usage notes, and may be amended at Dave's discretion.
general.1_2:
1.2 Agreement to Terms

By using the Platform, you are deemed to have fully agreed to these Terms and all related guidelines. If you do not agree to the Terms, you must stop using the service. If you have any questions or need further explanation, Dave is available to assist you through customer service or official channels.
general.1_3:
1.3 Registration and Consent

The information you provide during registration must be accurate and your own. Clicking the registration button is considered an electronic signature and is legally binding.

use.title: 2. Use of Service
use.2_1:
2.1 Account Creation and Management
Each user may only have one account, and all activities are the user's own responsibility. Providing false information, using someone else's information, or using automated registration programs is prohibited. Violations may result in service restrictions or account suspension.
use.2_2:
2.2 Prohibited Actions
Dave prohibits the following actions:
  - Unauthorized access to or attacks on the platform's system or network
  - Unauthorized collection of other users' accounts, personal information, or transaction history
  - Attempting fraudulent or false asset transactions
  - Any intentional disruption of platform operations
use.2_3:
2.3 Service Changes and Suspension
Dave may, after prior notice, change or temporarily suspend certain features or the entire service for security updates, system maintenance, policy changes, or to comply with legal requirements. Dave is not responsible for any losses resulting from such actions.

liability.title: 3. User Responsibilities and Rights
liability.3_1:
3.1 User Responsibilities
Users are responsible for securely managing their accounts, digital asset wallets, and login information.
Dave is not liable for losses resulting from user negligence (e.g., phishing, loss, or third-party exposure).
liability.3_2:
3.2 Disclaimer
Dave is not responsible for damages arising from the following situations:
  - Unexpected technical errors, system failures, hacking, or other external factors
  - Service suspension due to government orders or changes in relevant laws
  - Blockchain network errors or transaction delays
liability.3_3:
3.3 Intellectual Property Rights
All designs, content, source code, logos, and data within the Dave platform are the property of the company.
Unauthorized reproduction, commercial use, or sharing with third parties may result in legal liability and is prohibited without the company's explicit consent.

etc.4:
4. Usage Restrictions
Misuse of services such as hacking, reverse engineering, and illegal activities is prohibited.
etc.5:
5. Data and Personal Information
Personal information is collected for service provision and improvement. Please check the Privacy Policy for details.
etc.6:
6. Terms Changes
Terms may be revised after prior notice, and continued use implies agreement to revised terms.
etc.7:
7. Governing Law
These terms are governed by the laws of the member's jurisdiction.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.1:
1. Overview

This Privacy Policy (hereinafter referred to as 'this Policy') applies to users who use Dave's services or visit Dave's website and mobile applications (hereinafter referred to as the 'Platform').
Dave places the highest priority on protecting users' privacy and transparently informs users about how personal information is collected, used, stored, and shared.

Dave provides optimized financial service experiences to help users' financial health, and this Policy clearly explains how personal information is collected and processed for that purpose.
By using Dave's services, you are deemed to have agreed to this Policy. If you do not agree, you must stop using the service.
privacy.2:
2. Definitions

  - Account: A personal identification account created by registering on the Dave platform
  - Services: All financial-related features provided by Dave (e.g., deposits and withdrawals, cashback, Dave ExtraCash™, automatic transfers, etc.)
  - Platform: Dave's website, mobile app, and other related digital services operated by Dave
  - User: An individual who uses Dave's platform or owns such an account
privacy.3:
3. Cookies and Tracking Technologies

Dave uses various tracking technologies such as cookies and web beacons to enhance user experience.

Information collected through these technologies is used for providing personalized services, traffic analysis, and measuring advertising performance. Users can refuse the collection of cookies through their browser settings.
privacy.4:
4. Types of Information Collected

  - Dave may collect the following categories of information:
  - User identification information: email, mobile phone number, name, date of birth, address, etc.
  - Financial information: linked bank account information, card details, transaction records, etc.
  - Technical information: access IP, device ID, operating system, browser type, etc.
  - Service usage records: in-app activity logs, inquiry and feedback history, etc.
privacy.5:
5. Purpose of Using Personal Information

Dave uses the collected information for the following purposes:

  - Authentication and management of user accounts
  - Analysis of users' financial status and provision of personalized financial solutions such as Dave ExtraCash™ and budgeting tools
  - Fulfillment of legal obligations related to AML/KYC (Anti-Money Laundering and Know Your Customer)
  - Internal audits and detection of fraudulent use to enhance security
  - Data analysis for service improvement and marketing
privacy.6:
6. Information Sharing and Entrustment

Dave only provides or entrusts personal information to external parties in the following cases:

  - When cooperating with trusted financial partners and technology vendors with user consent
  - When required by law or upon request from judicial authorities for public safety
  - All partners are subject to contracts and supervision according to Dave's personal information protection standards.
privacy.7:
7. Retention and Deletion

Dave deletes relevant information without delay after the purpose of collection has been achieved.
- However, information is securely stored for the mandatory retention period stipulated by relevant laws, after which it is permanently deleted or anonymized.
privacy.8:
8. User Rights

Users may exercise the following rights at any time:

  - Request to view and copy
  - Request to correct and delete
  - Request to suspend processing

 -Requests can be made through the settings menu in the Dave app or via customer support channels.
privacy.contact:
Contact

For inquiries regarding personal information, please contact the Upstart customer center.

※ This Policy may be amended with prior notice in accordance with changes in laws or service policies.
